PickedChoices: ^A new name, a new color, is that a revolution?
^This is nice, YPZ, but people are dying..
revolution: ^YPZ: It's our first step. You can't have revolution without solidarity, you can't have a movement without people. I want a bunch of us, standing united at the gates of MEDicil, demanding they give us the dignity of treatment.
revolution2: ^YPZ: I want us at City Hall, painting their doors with blood. We've been quiet, we've been small, and we're dying. We must act.
dying: ^YPZ: I know, I know. I'm also trying to plan out a protest. I want a bunch of us, standing in solidarity at the gates of MEDicil, demanding they give us the dignity of treatment.
dying2: ^YPZ:  You're great, of course, but it's insane that you're still the only one looking after us.
Well: ^YPZ: Thank you. We've gotta find the hope in all this. It's our only choice.
